Sabbath School Teachers
 

     Those satisfied with following a dry order will miss the mark as Sabbath school teachers.--Those who are satisfied with following a certain dry order, of going through a round, will miss the mark, and fail of the work that should be done by a Sabbath-school teacher; but if those who engage in this important branch of God's cause are Christians in the full sense of the word, doing the work given them of God in His fear, working with love for souls for whom Christ died, they will be laborers together with God.--CSW 104.
